We can’t keep borrowing trillions. Our public debt wasn't projected to reach the level we're at now until years in the future, and yet most in Congress continue to shrug off trillion dollar deficits. 

That should advance the discussion of how we address our systemic debt issue. https://t.co/3MlxXOmIEY

Our nuclear plants operate at historic high safety levels, but we can't let our guard down. It's irresponsible to let the Nuclear Regulatory Commission go without a confirmed, independent regulator.

I'm a believer that to go forward from here it's mostly about a smart restart of our economy, because I don't think the federal government can be a replacement for our economy. #indianatownhall

We need to be entrepreneurial in restarting the economy, on a state-by-state, county-by-county basis. Business owners are prepared to stay disciplined to do what we need to do as we get a vaccine and treatments and put this in the rearview mirror. 
#IndianaTownHall @FOX59

In a letter to Agriculture Secretary Sonny Perdue, Mr. Braun said the supply chain for frozen and canned fruits and vegetables operates “on extremely short harvest and processing windows.” https://t.co/AXk79rTNDO

Produce has a short harvest and processing window and is particularly vulnerable.
 
“Our nation’s annual supply of canned and frozen corn, green beans, tomatoes, peaches and peas are harvested and packed within the span of two to three months.” @thehill 
https://t.co/w8cvweACdo

As American citizens do their part to slow the spread of #COVID19 through social distancing and other measures, it is critical that our nation’s canneries and frozen food suppliers can keep shelves stocked with a full supply of non-perishable foods.
https://t.co/1ZM5re7S7Q

Senator Mike Braun wrote a letter to Agriculture Secretary Sonny Perdue asking him to protect the canned and frozen fruit supply chain, since the president's executive order delegates authority under the DPA concerning the food supply chain.
https://t.co/eTOw4UVJmT

THREAD: The #coronavirus impacts our health and our economy, and I will be supporting this assistance package which provides massive assistance for our hospitals...
